subject: Basketball
Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: The resolution singles out Dirk Nowitzki for choosing to re-sign with the Mavericks in 2010, “thus remaining loyal to the team, city and fans for whom he played his entire career.”
snippet: The resolution singles out Dirk Nowitzki for choosing to re-sign with the Mavericks in 2010, “thus remaining loyal to the team, city and fans for whom he played his entire career.”
